CustomField.description: Transfers VAT ID to invoice - shown via placeholder on invoice
CustomField.formula: IF( OR ( BillingCountry = "Belgien", BillingCountry = "Bulgarien", BillingCountry = "Dänemark", BillingCountry = "Estland", BillingCountry = "Finnland", BillingCountry = "Frankreich", BillingCountry = "Griechenland", BillingCountry = "Grossbritannien", BillingCountry = "Niederlande", BillingCountry = "Italien", BillingCountry = "Irland", BillingCountry = "Kroatien", BillingCountry = "Lettland", BillingCountry = "Litauen", BillingCountry = "Luxemburg", BillingCountry = "Malta", BillingCountry = "Österreich", BillingCountry = "Polen", BillingCountry = "Portugal", BillingCountry = "Rumänien", BillingCountry = "Schweden", BillingCountry = "Slowakei", BillingCountry = "Slowenien", BillingCountry = "Spanien", BillingCountry = "Tschechien", BillingCountry = "Ungarn", BillingCountry = "Zypern", BillingCountry = "Schweiz" ), "VAT ID: " + txtVATID__c , null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Transfers VAT ID to invoice - shown via placeholder on invoice
CustomField.label: JustOn: VAT ID
